themes: private sector philanthropy and targeted funding
equity and transparency in cultural leadership
economic development tied to cultural support
key_phrases: bring real philanthropy to those who need the most
the 2016 Live Music census tells you exactly who needs it most
break the silos and the gatekeeping of special interests at boards like the Music Commission
ensure that stages and opportunities are not going only to the 'cool kids in their club' but to all
lead with heart, equity, economic development and transparency
you are the keepers of the soul of our city
barriers_identified: silos and gatekeeping of special interests at boards
stages and opportunities going only to the 'cool kids in their club'
solutions_proposed: Look to initiatives like Mid Arts American Alliance and fellowships like Artist Inc to help creatives help themselves
Work with private sector to bring real philanthropy to those who need the most
Use the 2016 Live Music census to identify who needs support most
Break the silos and gatekeeping at boards like the Music Commission
Lead with heart, equity, economic development and transparency
